TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit LogExtentCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.IO.Log.LogExtent>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class LogExtentCollection Implements IEnumerable(Of LogExtent)

summary.span: 表示与 关联的 对象的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of objects associated with a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含与 关联的 对象的集合。This class contains a collection of objects associated with a . 实例将其数据存储在磁盘范围的集合中，这些范围由 实例表示。A instance stores its data in a collection of disk extents, represented by instances. 特定的 与一个 相关联，同一 中的 对象具有相同的大小。A particular is associated with one , and objects in the same are of identical size. 将以范围增量的形式在 实例中添加和移除空间。Space is added to and removed from a instance in extent increments. 虽然 对象在磁盘上以文件的形式表示，但不应像普通文件那样移动或删除它们。Although objects are represented on disk as files, they should not be moved or deleted as normal files. 相反，应使用此类提供的方法直接添加和删除 实例。Rather, you should use the methods provided by this class for adding and deleting instances directly. 当范围不再包含任何活动数据时，通常会将其移除。Extents are usually removed when they no longer contain any active data. 但是，如果 `force` 方法中的 参数为 `true`，并且无法立即移除范围，则会引发异常。However, if the `force` parameter in the method is `true`, an exception is thrown if they cannot be removed immediately. 无法移除 中的最后一个范围，这意味着在添加范围后 属性不能为零。You cannot remove the last extent in the , which means that the property cannot be zero after an extent is added. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 和 类来添加和模拟日志序列中的范围。This example shows how to use the and classes to add and emulate extents in a log sequence. [!code-csharp[S_UELogRecordSequence#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelogrecordsequence/cs/mylogrecordsequence.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UELogRecordSequence#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uelogrecordsequence/vb/mylogrecordsequence.vb#0)]

span.span: Creates a new and adds it to the collection.

summary.span: 将一个 实例添加到集合中。

span.span: Adds a instance to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新添加的 实例的大小与集合中的现有 实例的大小相同。The size of the newly added instance is the same as the size of existing instances in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 不要使用此方法将第一个 添加到集合中。Do not use this method to add the first to the collection. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用 和 类来添加和模拟日志序列中的范围。This example shows how to use the and classes to add and emulate extents in a log sequence. summary.span: 使用指定大小创建新的 ，并将其添加到集合中。

span.span: Creates a new with the specified size and adds it to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合不为空，指定的大小必须至少与集合中其他范围的大小一样大。If the collection is not empty, the specified size must be at least as large as the size of the other extents in the collection. 在这种情况下，将忽略 `size` 参数，并使用与集合中的其他范围相同的大小创建范围。In this case, the `size` parameter is ignored, and the extent is created with the same size as the other extents in the collection.

Docs.exception:
操作由于以下原因之一而无效：
The operation is invalid for one of the following reasons:
- 枚举已经终止。The enumeration has ended.
- 集合已修改。The collection has been modified.
- 枚举尚未开始。The enumeration has not been started.必须调用 。A call to must be made.

span.span: The instance to remove.

param.name: force
param.span: 如果应立即移除范围，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the extent should be removed immediately; otherwise, .

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的 实例。

span.span: Removes the specified instance from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 实例不是 活动区域的一部分时，才能将该实例从集合中移除。A instance can be removed from the collection only if it is not part of the active region of the . 如果 `force` 参数为 `true`，并且无法立即移除范围，则会引发异常。If the `force` parameter is `true` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, an exception is thrown. 如果 `force` 参数为 `false`，并且无法立即移除范围，则会延迟移除操作，直到其不再是活动区域的一部分。If the `force` parameter is `false` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, the removal is deferred until it is no longer part of the active region. 无法移除 中的最后一个范围，这意味着在添加范围后 属性不能为零。You cannot remove the last extent in the , which means that the property cannot be zero once an extent has been added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有在 实例不是 活动区域的一部分时，才能将该实例从集合中移除。A instance can be removed from the collection only if it is not part of the active region of the . 如果 `force` 参数为 `true`，并且无法立即移除范围，则会引发异常。If the `force` parameter is `true` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, an exception is thrown. 如果 `force` 参数为 `false`，并且无法立即移除范围，则会延迟移除操作，直到其不再是活动区域的一部分。If the `force` parameter is `false` and the extent cannot be removed immediately, the removal is deferred until it is no longer part of the active region. 无法移除 中的最后一个范围，这意味着在添加范围后 属性不能为零。You cannot remove the last extent in the , which means that the property cannot be zero once an extent has been added.
